column3: Woah, what’s that? Is that the head of the great warrior who died in this place?
Bye bozo! We’re gonna get the gem before you. Cry now loser L WAHAHAHA
I won’t let that happen. With the power of my heart and soul,
I would get the last fragment of the gem! You can’t stop me
Before you can get this last fragment of the gem, I want to see the both of you battle each other.
I’ll only give this last fragment of the gem to the worthiest man in this place.
